title: Does “Early Education” Come Way Too Late? (Rebroadcast)
description: In our collective zeal to reform schools and close the achievement gap, we may have lost sight of where most learning really happens — at home.
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
content:encoded: In our collective zeal to reform schools and close the achievement gap, we may have lost sight of where most learning really happens — at home.
